Title: Sequined gown with lace applique bodice

Sizes: 18, 6, 16, 14, 12, 10, 8

Colors: black, champagne

Category: evening, formal-gowns

Featured-image: R2014-champagne-sequined-gown-with-lace-applique-bodice_p.jpg

----

Description: Form fitting A-line with fully sequined skirt gives this dress a sparkle that is unbeatable. The sweetheart neckline with lace applique covering the bodice add a level of sex appeal to this refined gown. The applique detail extends to the back of the gown and a slight train completes this gown flawlessly.
